Index:

@@ -3,4 +3,13 @@
 title: Linux命令
 date: 2021-11-11 09:52:14
 tags: Linux command
 ---
+
+#### rename
+
+批量修改后缀名
+```bash
+
+rename s/\后缀1/\后缀/' *
+rename 's/\.tar.gz.1/\.tar.gz/' *
+```
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -12,6 +12,7 @@
 
 rename s/\后缀1/\后缀/' *
 
 rename s/\后缀1/\后缀/' ** //递归所有的子目录
-rename 's/\.tar.gz.1/\.tar.gz/' *
+
+example: rename 's/\.tar.gz.1/\.tar.gz/' *
 ```
\ No newline at end of file
